attributes.action: Make the Covid Vaccination rollout 24 hours a day, to speed up the process
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to highlight that there is a "Clamour for Jabs" at all times of the day.
attributes.background:
On the 11th of January 2021 it was reported on Twitter by the Daily Mail Political Jason Groves that "No 10 says Covid vaccinations could be delivered late into the night, but insists there's currently 'not a clamour for jabs after 8pm"
 
He's Wrong.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
